Ini Nama-Nama Calon Hakim Yang Lolos Tahap III Komisi Yudisial
05 Nov 2019, 19:35 by Fitratun KOmariah



Ini Nama-Nama Calon Hakim Yang Lolos Tahap III Komisi Yudisial



Ini Nama-Nama Calon Hakim Yang Lolos Tahap III Komisi Yudisial


 KBRN, Jakarta: Komisi Yudisial (KY) Republik Indonesia mengumumkan 13 orang Calon Hakim Agung (CHA) yang berhasil lolos di tahap III, yakni seleksi kesehatan dan kepribadian. Hasil ini ditetapkan dalam Rapat Pleno KY pada Selasa, 5 November 2019. "13 calon hakim agung tersebut berasal dari jalur karier sebanyak 12 orang dan jalur nonkarier sebanyak 1 orang," ujar Ketua Bidang Rekrutmen Hakim Komisi Yudisial, Aidul Fitriciada Azhari saat jumpa pers di Gedung Komisi Yudisial, Jakarta. Selasa, (5/11/2019). Selanjutnya para calon hakim agung tersebut akan mengikuti seleksi wawancara pada pekan depan, tanggal 12 - 14 November 2019. Dalam wawancara ini CHA akan digali lebih mendalam mengenai visi, misi, dan komitmen, serta Kode Etik dan Pedoman Perilaku Hakim (KEPPH). Tidak hanya itu, para calon hakim agung juga akan ditanya mengenai filsafat dan teori hukum, wawasan pengetahuan peradilan dan perkembangan hukum, serta penguasaan hukum materiil dan formil.Sekadar informasi, seleksi CHA ini untuk mengisi 8 orang hakim agung dengan rincian: 3 orang untuk kamar Pidana, 1 orang untuk kamar Agama, 2 orang untuk kamar Militer, 4 orang untuk kamar Perdata, dan 1 orang untuk kamar Tata Usaha Negara khusus pajak.Sementara itu, pada kesempatan yang sama Ketua Bidang Rekrutmen Hakim Prof. Aidul Fitriciada Azhari juga mengumumkan 4 orang calon hakim ad hoc Tindak Pidana Korupsi dan 4 orang calon hakim ad hoc Hubungan Industrial di Mahkamah Agung (MA). Para calon yang lolos berhak mengikuti seleksi wawancara pada Jumat, 15 November 2019 untuk calon hakim ad hoc Tipikor di MA dan Senin, 18 November 2019 untuk calon hakim ad hoc Hubungan Industrial di MA.Kebutuhan untuk hakim ad hoc pada MA berjumlah sembilan orang dengan rincian: tiga hakim ad hoc Tindak Pidana Korupsi pada MA dan enam hakim ad hoc Hubungan Industrial di MA.Hakim ad hoc Hubungan Industrial pada MA berasal dari unsur Asosiasi Pengusaha Indonesia (APINDO) sebanyak tiga orang dan Serikat Pekerja/Serikat Buruh berjumlah tiga orang.Berikut nama-nama Calon Hakim Agung yang lolos seleksi Tahap III (kesehatan dan kepribadian) : Kamar Pidana : Artha Theresia Silalahi, Soesilo. Kamar Perdata : Dwi Sugiarto, Maryana, Rahmi Mulyati, Sumpeno.Kamar Agama : Ahmad Choiri, Busra. Kamar Militer : Kolonel Sus Reki Irene Lumme, Brigjen TNI Sugeng Sutrisno, Kolonel Chk Tiarsen Buaton. Kamar Tata Usaha Negara : Sartono, Triyono Martanto. Sedangkan nama-nama calon hakim ad hoc Tindak Pidana Korupsi pada Mahkamah Agung: Adly, Agus Yunianto, Ansori, Siti Chomarijah Lita Samsi Calon hakim ad hoc Hubungan Industrial pada Mahkamah Agung dari unsur APINDO : Jaka Mulyata, Willy Farianto.Calon nama hakim ad hoc Hubungan Industrial pada Mahkamah Agung dari unsur serikat pekerja/serikat buruh : M. Mariyanto, Sugiyanto.

These Are the Names of Prospective Judges Who Passed Stage III of the Judicial Commission
05 Nov 2019, 19:35 by Fitratun KOmariah



These Are the Names of Prospective Judges Who Passed Stage III of the Judicial Commission



These Are the Names of Prospective Judges Who Passed Stage III of the Judicial Commission


KBRN, Jakarta: The Judicial Commission (KY) of the Republic of Indonesia announced 13 Candidates for the Supreme Judge (CHA) who successfully passed stage III, namely health and personality selection. These results were determined at the KY Plenary Meeting on Tuesday, November 5, 2019. "The 13 candidates for the Chief Justice came from 12 career paths and 1 non-career path," said Judicial Commission Judge Recruitment Chairperson Aidul Fitriciada Azhari during a press conference at Judicial Commission Building, Jakarta. Tuesday, (5/11/2019). Furthermore, the prospective Supreme Court judges will take part in the interview selection next week, November 12-14, 2019. In this interview the CHA will be explored more deeply about the vision, mission and commitment, as well as the Code of Ethics and the Code of Conduct for Judges (KEPPH). Not only that, the prospective justices will also be asked about the philosophy and theory of law, insight into judicial knowledge and legal development, as well as mastery of material and formal law. Just for information, the CHA selection is to fill 8 justices with details: 3 people for rooms Criminal, 1 person for the Religious room, 2 people for the Military room, 4 people for the Civil room, and 1 person for the special tax administration room. Meanwhile, on the same occasion the Chairman of the Recruitment Section for Judges Prof. Aidul Fitriciada Azhari also announced 4 candidates for ad hoc judges for Corruption and 4 candidates for ad hoc judges for Industrial Relations in the Supreme Court (MA). The candidates who passed were entitled to take part in the interview selection on Friday, November 15, 2019 for prospective ad hoc judges in the Supreme Court and Monday, November 18, 2019 for the ad hoc judge candidates for Industrial Relations in the MA. The need for ad hoc judges in the Supreme Court was nine people with details : three ad hoc judges Corruption Acts in the Supreme Court and six ad hoc judges Industrial Relations in the MA. The ad hoc judges for Industrial Relations in the MA came from three Indonesian Employers' Association (APINDO) elements and three Trade Unions / Trade Unions. the names of Candidates for Supreme Court Judge who passed the Phase III selection (health and personality): Criminal Chamber: Artha Theresia Silalahi, Soesilo. Civil Chamber: Dwi Sugiarto, Maryana, Rahmi Mulyati, Sumpeno.Religion Room: Ahmad Choiri, Busra. Military Chamber: Colonel Sus Reki Irene Lumme, Brigadier General Sugeng Sutrisno, Colonel Chk Tiarsen Buaton. State Administration Room: Sartono, Triyono Martanto. While the names of the candidates for ad hoc judges Corruption in the Supreme Court: Adly, Agus Yunianto, Ansori, Siti Chomarijah Lita Samsi Candidates for ad hoc judges Industrial Relations at the Supreme Court from the APINDO elements: Jaka Mulyata, Willy Farianto.Calon the names of ad hoc judges Industrial relations at the Supreme Court from the union / labor union elements: M. Mariyanto, Sugiyanto.
